name: Afghanistan
seoDescription: Afghanistan faces severe humanitarian crisis under Taliban rule: economic collapse, gender apartheid, and over two decades of foreign occupation.

name: Democratic Republic of the Congo
seoDescription: DRC's endless war over strategic minerals has displaced millions. Discover the colonial legacy, foreign exploitation, and path to lasting peace.

name: Haiti
seoDescription: Haiti's state collapse and crushing foreign debt create widespread chaos. Learn about the 200-year struggle for sovereignty and international responsibility.

name: Myanmar
seoDescription: Myanmar's military junta faces massive popular uprising after 2021 coup. Explore ethnic conflicts, Rohingya crisis, and path to democratic transition.

name: Palestine
seoDescription: Palestine's intensifying humanitarian catastrophe: genocide in Gaza, apartheid system, and 75 years of dispossession. Critical analysis of settler colonialism.

name: Sahel
seoDescription: The Sahel region's deadly jihadist insurgency compounds the climate crisis. Armed groups, foreign military interventions, and the fight for regional stability.

name: Somalia
seoDescription: Somalia's 30-year state collapse: al-Shabaab insurgency, climate disasters, and artificial colonial borders. Understanding famine and foreign interventions.

name: South Sudan
description: Conflict over control of oil revenues
seoDescription: South Sudan's oil-fuelled civil war has displaced millions. The world's newest nation struggles with corruption, ethnic violence, and fragile peace agreements.

name: Sudan
seoDescription: Sudan's military factions battle for power following the 2021 coup. Mass displacement, economic collapse, and the struggle for democratic transition.

name: Yemen
description: Conflict over a strategic trade route
seoDescription: Yemen's proxy war over Red Sea trade routes creates the world's worst humanitarian crisis. Saudi-UAE intervention and Houthi resistance since 2015.
